case.title: Looking for regular fun - m4w - 55 (NW London)
case.text:
Looking for regular fun with like minded lady - cam, meet, anything as long as it's naughty adult and fun.
Live and work at home, and will drive too... so quite flexible any time anyday... Civilised if possible so lunch, dinner or both are serious options too.
More details and photos if i get a genuine reply.
